caption.p: Map of all large marine protected areas used in this study. Blue areas indicate designated large marine protected areas (those with a legal boundary, as of December 2015) and are numbered; orange areas indicate proposed large marine protected areas and the number is preceded with a ‘P’ (n = 2). Full names of the large marine protected areas are in Supplementary Table 1. Figure created using ArcGIS v.10.3.1 http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/.
